channel.title: New Game Mode Suggestion & Gender Specific Queen/King Roles
channel.description:
**Suggestion 1: New Game Mode**
20 people but unseen and cult are in the same game. Paladin would convert to Templar if converted by unseen
Passive: Holy Spirit The Unseen are told if they were attempted to be converted into the Cult.
Abilities:
Determine Loyalty: Determine if a player is convertible or not 2 uses
Unholy Faith: If a player is cult, kill them and do not consume a use of this ability. If they are not cult but convertible, kill them and consume a use of this ability. If they are not convertable and not cult, take your own life. 2 uses
The Templar picture: https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/261525739617255424/376537800297807872/The_Templar-Card.png
The Templar would be a Killer class.
**Suggestion 2: King/Queen Gender Specific**
I find it highly odd that a Princess can become King.
How about female roles instead become queen? The Queen will have a different ability than Allies which would be called “Similarities” Similarities will display something along the lines of “You will see if (name) has any similarities with (name).”
This ability will have 5 uses. You pair someone with another person to see if they are the same Class type.
Roles that would become Queen/King
Physician/Herbalist: Player would Decide Drunk/Alcoholic: King Noble/Aristocrat: King Princess/Duchess: Queen Butler/Servant: King Alchemist: Queen Assassin: Previous Class would Decide Court Wizard/Sage: King Cult Leader: King Knight/Enforcer: King Fool: Player would Decide Hunter: King Psychic/Illusionist: Queen Invoker: Previous Class would Decide Sheriff/Marshal: King Mastermind: Player would Decide Mercenary/Sellsword: Queen Observer/Nighwatch: King Paladin: King Possessor: Player would Decide Priest: Queen Prince: King Reaper: Player would Decide Ritualist: Previous Class would Decide Scorned: Queen Seeker: Previous Class would Decide
If the Player would Decide they would Decide the following night the King/Queen died what they would be if they got chosen to become King/Queen
Please do take my idea into consideration. If anyone has any questions please do ask away.

also there’s no point

like, none whatsoever

women Kings have existed before, and Kings aren’t elected so “King” in ToL is moreso an arbitrary title signalling an elected leader, such as President or Prime Minister

item.title: New Game Mode Suggestion & Gender Specific Queen/King Roles
item.dc:creator: Grizzfang
item.description:
KyoDaz:

Unholy Faith:

If a player is convertible, kill them. If they are unable to be converted take your own life.

2 uses

Wouldn’t this ability make more sense the other way around, killing unconvertables? Also it doesn’t make much sense for an unseen to take their own life.

With regards to the King’s gender, it’s been discussed way too often on the Discord, but the gist of it is that King is actually not a gendered word and both men and women can be King.
